name: Reflection of Mine
description: Reflection of Mine is a dark puzzle video game about the dissociative identity disorder. The entire game takes place in the broken mind of Lilly Witchgan and the goal is to discover who is real â€“ Lilly herself or one of her many personalities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
